occupation: Director of Sales & Marketing at Rosen Hotels & Resorts
headline: Director of Sales & Marketing, Rosen Hotels & Resorts, Rosen Plaza Hotel
summary: Award winning, experienced Convention Sales professional skilled in relationship management, Hotel Management,  account and event management. Strong understanding of hotel operations and financial management including revenue and expense control for group programs, budget analysis and forecasting. Skilled in creating innovative ideas to generate new business and retain existing business to meet or exceed budgets, increase revenues and improve profitability. Excellent at managing and multi-tasking simultaneously while maintaining a high standard of professionalism and a sense of humor that helps motivate and inspire others. Exceptional communicator who effectively collaborates with colleagues, vendors and customers.

experiences.title: Associate Director Of Sales
experiences.description: Over 20 years partnering with the Mid-Atlantic Association, Corporate and Government markets.  Responsible for the solicitation, contracting and relationship management for Rosen Shingle Creek, Rosen Centre Hotel and Rosen Plaza Hotel, three amazing convention properties representing a combined 3,635 guest rooms and more than 650,000 sq feet of meeting space.

experiences.title: Senior Sales Manager
experiences.description: Various rolls over the years to include, Walt Disney World College Program (internship), Disney Management Development Program Graduate (Food & Beverage discipline), Restaurant Manager in various hotels to include Disney Inn, Disney's Grand Floridian, Disney's Contemporary Resort, Downtown Disney Marketplace, Hotel Duty Manager, Opening team 1992 at Disneyland Paris, Senior Services Manager, Disney's Fairytale Weddings, Senior Sales Manager, Disney Park & Event Sales.
